DOC.brief_title: Biomarkers Prognosis Ambulatory Chronic Heart Failure Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Upon enrollment study , Troponin I ( cTn I ) , BNP , norepinephrine , plasma renin activity , aldosterone , high-sensitivity C-reactive protein ( hs-CRP ) , tumor necrosis factor-alpha ( TNF-alpha ) , interleukin-6 ( IL-6 ) , soluble receptor interleukin 2 ( sIL-2R ) , leptin , prealbumin , free malondialdehyde , 15-F2t-isoprostane protein-bound nitrotyrosine measure stable ambulatory , non diabetic , elderly heart failure patient . Patients follow death study termination ( 31st January 2009 ) .
